 Com presente emprestimo 10.000.00mt para o sector da Agro-pecuaria  ira comprar semente, adubos ,  fertielizantes e pagar agua para irrigar a estufaA.
No futuro deseja oficializar sua relacao, voltar a estudar e aranjar um bom emprego. 
O principal desafio é ter uma boa saúde para poder alcançar seus objectivos
texts.en:
27-year-old Paulino is a security guard. He's been in a common law marriage for two years and lives with his family in a house that he owns. He has a son and, aside from his son, he also supports his parents who live with him.
With the current loan of 10,000mt he'll purchase seeds, compost and fertilizer for his farming business, and he'll pay for water for irrigating the greenhouse.
His wish for the future is to make his marriage official, go back to school and get a good job.
The main challenge he faces is being in good health so that he can achieve his projects.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, compost and fertilizer, and to pay for water for irrigating the greenhouse.

loans.name: Nazma's Group

texts.en:
Nazma, a member of a two-person borrower group, is a 48-year-old, hardworking housewife with four sons and one daughter and is a resident of Rawalpindi, Pakistan. For the past five years, her husband has been driving a van, which is the only source of income for his family.

Nazma has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to expand her husband's transportation business by buying a new van. They are saving money for this purpose and with the addition of loan amount, they would be able to buy this van. This will not only help expand their transportation business, but will also help increase their monthly income.

She is very hopeful that the loan will be productive so that they can meet the basic necessities of their family and provide education to their children.

loans.use: to purchase a van

loans.name: Chan

texts.en:
Chan is a 46-year-old housewife who lives with her husband, two daughters and two sons in Rawalpindi, Pakistan. Since 2003, Chan's husband has had a general store, and he works very hard to meet his family's needs. 

He needs additional capital for the growth of his business, so Chan has requested a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan so he can buy a variety of goods for his store including flour, sugar, pulses and detergent to satisfy his clients more professionally as well as increase his net income. Chan and her husband are very hopeful that the loan will be a productive one for their family.

loans.use: To buy flour, sugar, pulses and detergent to sell

loans.name: Beatriz

texts.pt:
Bombeira, mae solteira de 1 filho menor de idade vive ainda com sua mae e 6 sobrinhos. 	
 Com presente emprestimo 20.000.00mt  para Habitacao  será aplicado na compra de  cimento, varroes,  barrotes e pedra para continuidade a sua obra.
No futuro deseja continuar com a obra ate a conclusao. 
O principal desafio é terminar sua obra ira pedir mais emprestimos para issso
texts.en:
Beatriz is a fire fighter. She's a single mother of an underage son. She still lives with her mother and six nieces and nephews.
She'll use the current loan of 20,000mt for housing expenses. She'll purchase cement, rods, beams and rocks in order to continue her construction work.
Her wish for the future is to keep the constructin work going until it's finished.
The main challenge she faces is finishing the construction work. She'll request more loans for that purpose.

loans.use: to purchase cement, rods, beams and rocks in order to continue her construction work.

loans.name: Jose Roberto

texts.es: Don José vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos de 19, 14 y 11 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, don José se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años su principal siembra es el maíz, sus productos los almacena en los comercios de compra-venta de granos básicos, con las ganancias que obtienen de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, don José solicita un crédito para la compra de abonos, herbicidas, fertilizantes, semillas, etc. para seguir con su cosecha y poderle dar a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: José lives in a house of his own with his wife and three children who are 19, 14 and 11 years of age; all attend school at present.  José has worked in agriculture for several years; his main crop is corn.  He stores his products in basic grains purchase and sale commercial firms.  With profits obtained from his sales he’s able to cover his household expenses.  José requests a loan to buy manure, herbicide, fertilizer, seeds, etc. to continue with his crops and be able to give his family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase 2 greenhouses and sea buckthorn trees to plant on their plot of land

loans.name: Agua De Vida Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatro socios microempresarios una de ellas es María Félix, socia exitosa tiene 57 años de edad, soltera y madre de dos hijos, su negocio es la venta de comida y ropa de cama que las comercializa en su comunidad y vecinos cercanos, su crédito lo invertirá en la compra de materia prima para hacer ropa de cama como 10 yardas de telas, conos de hilos, agujas, tiras bordadas, materia prima de comida verduras como chayote, zanahorias, chiltoma, cebolla, tomates, plátanos, carne de pollo, carne de res, sal etc. Yamileth tiene 36 años de edad su negocio es la venta de verduras , Martha tiene 32 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y Miguel hombre microempresario su negocio es la venta de ropa variada nueva.
texts.en:
This is a group consisting of four micro entrepreneurs.  One of them is María Félix, a successful, 57-year-old single member and mother of two children.  Her business is selling food and bed linens around her community and to nearby neighbors.  She will use the loan to buy raw materials like 10 yards of fabric, cones of thread, embroidered strips and needles to make bed linens and raw materials to make meals like chayote, carrots, peppers, onions, tomatoes, bananas, chicken, beef, salt, etc.

Yamileth, 36, sells vegetables; Martha, 32, sells new clothes and Miguel is a micro businessman who sells varied new clothes.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies and food preparation ingredients.

loans.name: Nazima

texts.en:
A loan of 25,000 PKR would help Nazima to meet the costs of repairing her home. She is a poor woman with a low monthly income from her husband, who is working in a carriage factory.

Her home needs repair as its roof is very weak, which can cause sudden damage. Nazima is very thankful to Kiva lenders.

loans.use: to meet the expenses of repairing the house

loans.name: Yovanny Ernesto

texts.es: Yovany de 38 años de edad se dedica a la elaboración y venta de sorbetes desde hace 20 años vende de forma ambúlate en las diferentes colonias que están cerca de su lugar de residencia tienen mucha clientela, con las ganancias que obtiene de su trabajo logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar vive en casa propia  con su esposa y sus dos hijos, yovany está solicitando un crédito para poder comprar polines, duralita y pago de mano de obra y  mandar a poner el techo a su vivienda ya que solamente tienen una galera hecha de laminas, y cuando es la temporada de lluvia  la galera no los cubre bien , y asi poderle dar  a su familia seguridad en su vivienda.
texts.en:
Yovany, 38, has been working making and ice-cream for 20 years.  He sells it from place to place in various neighborhoods near his place of residence.  He has many customers and with profits earned from his work he’s able to cover some of his household expenses.  He lives in a house of his own with his wife and two children.

Yovany’s asking for a loan to buy roofing purlins, fiber roofing sheets and to pay labor costs to install a room on his house since he currently just has a big shed made of sheeting and when it rains it doesn’t shelter them very well.  In this way he will be able to give his family amore secure home.

loans.use: to buy roofing supplies.

loans.name: Jorge Antonio

texts.es: Don jorge de 61 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde varios años su principal siembra es el maíz y el frijol, comercializa sus productos en las agencias de compra venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia, vive con su esposa y su dos hijos en casa propia, don jorge solicita un crédito a INTEGRAL para la comprar de abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, herbicidas, etc. para poder seguir con sus cosechas ya que esa es su unica fuente de trabajo y asi poderle dar a su familia lo que necesita sin limitación alguna.
texts.en: Jorge, 61, has worked in agriculture for several years; his main crops are corn and beans.  He sells his products to agencies that buy and sell basic grains near his place of residence.  He lives with his wife and two children in a house of his.  Jorge’s asking Integral for a loan to buy manure, fertilizer, seeds, herbicide, etc. to be able to continue with his crops since this is his only source of income to provide what his family needs with no limitations whatsoever.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy multi-colored twine and to pay labor costs.

loans.name: Jean Poll

texts.es:
Jean es un joven muy alegre y entusiasta, vive en al ciudad de Ica, la cual se caracteriza por su clima cálido y acogedor. Jean es un joven trabajador, estudio la carrera de Psicología, pero como no encontraba empleo inicio con mucho esfuerzo y ahorro su negocio de disk jockey, el trabaja especialmente los fines de semana ya que ofrece sus servicios ya sea en matrimonios, cumpleaños, quinceañeros, entre otros, poco a poco ha ido mejorando su negocio y el cree que esta saliendo adelante porque es muy amable con los clientes y sobre todo porque ofrece buenas mesclas musicales.

Jean esta muy agradecido con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podra comprar un  protector especial para su controlador de música cuyo costo es muy caro y le servira para proteger su maquina ya que es muy delicada y costosa, de esta manera podrá tener sus herramientas en perfecto estado ya que la avería de esta máquina sería muy perjudicial para su pequeño negocio, así el seguirá luchando cada día para poder hacer realidad su negocio.
texts.en:
Jean is a very happy and enthusiastic young man who lives in the city of Ica, characterized for its warm and friendly climate. Jean is a hard working young man who studied Psychology but could not find a job within this area. He started his business as a disk jockey with a great amount of effort and savings. He works the most on the weekends as he offers his services for weddings, birthdays, quinceañeras and other celebrations. Little by little he has improved his business and believes that he is getting ahead because he is very friendly with his clients and above all because he offers good music. 

Jean is very thankful for the Kiva lenders because thanks to the help brought forth, he will be able to buy a special case for his turntable, which is very expensive and will protect the turntable, given that it is a very delicate and expensive piece of equipment. In this way he will be able to have his tools in perfect condition since any damage to this equipment would be very harmful to his small business. He will continue fighting each day to be able to make his business a reality.

loans.use: to buy a special case for his turntable

loans.name: Ruth Marina

texts.es:
Ruth tiene 35 años de edad, vive en el distrito de Parcona, Ica, Peru. Ruth es madre de una pequeña de 7 años de edad, a la cual ama muchísimo y por la cual lucha cada dia de manera incansable para brindarle lo mejor y que tenga mejores oportunidades para surgir. 

Día a día Ruth trabaja en su pequeño negocio de venta de productos nutricionales, le dedica alrededor de 10 horas al día, y con el fruto de su trabajo puede solventar los gastos de su hogar; ella cree que esta saliendo adelante porque es muy amable con sus clientes y sobre todo porque tiene el mejor motivo para surgir, el cual es su hija.

Ruth está muy agradecida con los prestamistas kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado ella podrá comprar los útiles para su pequeño hijo como libros, cuadernos, uniformes, entre otros; de esta manera Ruth podrá seguir trabajando para sacar adelante a su hija y hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Darle una profesión a su hija y tener un gran tienda”.
texts.en:
Ruth, 35, lives in the district of Parcona in Ica, Peru.  She is the mother of a 7-year-old daughter who she loves very much.   Every day she works tirelessly to give her daughter all the opportunities she can.

Ruth works every day in her small business selling health products.  She spends around ten hours a day and uses the profits she makes to cover household expenses.  She believes business is prospering because she is kind to customers  and, also, because her daughter is her best motivation to get ahead.

Ruth is very grateful to Kiva lenders because thanks to your help she will be able to buy school supplies such as notebooks, uniforms, etc. for her daughter.  Ruth will be able to continue working and providing for her daughter, while also striving to reach her goal of:  "Giving her daughter a good education and owning a store one day".

loans.use: To buy books, materials and other supplies.

loans.name: Ana Isabel

texts.es: Doña ana de 47 años de edad se dedica  a la crianza y engorde de pollos desde hace 7 años y los vende en los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su lugar de residencia tiene mucha clientela fija pues los vende a precios realmente accesibles, doña ana vive con su esposo en casa propia, ella esta solicitando un crédito para la compra de concentrado y 100 pollos ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y poder tener una mejor vida con su esposo.
texts.en: Ana, 47, works raising and fattening up chickens; she’s been in business for 7 years and she sells them in various markets near her place of residence.  She has many customers because she sells at really affordable prices.  Ana lives with her husband in a house of her own and is asking for a loan to buy 100 chicks and feed concentrate since this is her only source of work so she and her husband can have a better life.

loans.use: to buy 100 chicks and feed for them.

loans.name: Ana De  Jesus

texts.es: Doña ana de 42 años de edad tiene un negocio desde hace 13 años  en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia donde vende  repollo y lechuga, tiene mucha clientela fija pues la buscan porque su producto es fresco y a buen precio, vive en casa propia es madre soltera vive con sus dos hijos de 13 y 8 años de edad ellos estudian actualmente, doña ana esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar los repollos y lechugas por mayor y asi tener siempre satisfechos a sus clientes y ella pueda obtener mejores ganancias para darle a sus hijos una mejor vida.
texts.en:
Ana, 42, has had a business in the market near her place of residence for 13 years where she sells cabbage and lettuce.  She has many regular customers who seek her out because her product is fresh and well-priced.  She lives in her own house and is a single mother; she lives with her two children who are 13 and 8 years of age and attending school at present.  

Ana’s asking for a loan to buy cabbage and lettuce at wholesale so her customers will always be satisfied and she can earn higher profits to give her children a better life.

loans.use: to buy cabbage and lettuce at wholesale.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: Don pedro de 49 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus tres hijos de 15, 14, y 11 años de edad, el se dedica a la agricultura siembra los principales granos básicos como lo son maíz y frijol tiene varios años de dedicarse a esa actividad con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos de su hogar, don pedro esta solicitando un crédito para poder comprar abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, herbicidas, etc. y asi poderle dar a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Pedro, 49, lives in his own house with his wife and three children who are 15, 14 and 11 years of age.  He works in agriculture growing the main basic grains like corn and beans.  He’s been in this activity for many years and with profits earned is able to cover his household expenses.

Pedro’s asking for a loan to be able to buy manure, fertilizer, seeds, herbicide, etc. to give his family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Antonela Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Lea mujer de 42 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos y su negocio es la venta de bisutería y ropa nueva actividad que viene realizando desde hace 8 años, de ser cliente de la  institución tiene cinco años lo que equivale 15 ciclos, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de aretes de platas, cadenas de plata, chapas, ropa nueva como pantalón de varón, pantalón de dama, chores de varón, blusas, camisetas de varón etc. Karla tiene 32 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa y cosméticos y Martha tiene 28 años y su negocio es la venta de ropa.
texts.en:
This group consists of three entrepreneurial members. One is Lea, who is 42 and married with three children. She has run a business selling costume jewelry and new clothing for eight years. Lea has been a client of the institution for five years, which is the equivalent of 15 loans. She will use the loan to purchase silver earrings and chains and silver plated items in addition to new clothing such as women's pants and blouses and men's pants, shorts, and shirts, etc.

Karla is 32 and runs a business selling clothing and cosmetics. 

Martha is 28 and runs a business selling clothing.

loans.use: to purchase silver jewelry, such as earrings, chains, and silver plated items; new clothing such as women's pants and blouses and men's pants, shorts, and shirts, etc.

loans.name: Maruja

texts.es:
Maruja, tiene 31 años, es una mujer honesta y muy trabajadora, esta casada y tiene 3 hijos con quienes vive en su casa propia.El trabajo de Maruja consiste en la confección de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños como blusas, faldas, pantalones, prendas intimas, camisas y otros. Se encarga con suma paciencia de elaborar las prendas que sus clientes le solicitan luego de haber seleccionado un modelo específico de revistas o catálogos además elabora con frecuencia algunas prendas que ella misma diseña las cuales pone a la venta en un pequeño espacio dentro de su casa. Se dedica a este trabajo más de 9 años, siempre ha trabajado sola y afirma que nunca tuvo algún reclamo por parte de sus clientes.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 600, por ello agradece la oportunidad que le brindan para que pueda concretar sus planes laborales. Afirma que se siente cómoda trabajando con los miembros de su banco comunal debido a la responsabilidad que muestran cada uno de ellos. 
Con el monto solicitado comprará cierta cantidad de telas e hilos que necesita para confeccionar algunas prendas que pondrá a la venta.
texts.en:
Maruja, 31, is an honest, very hardworking woman.  She’s married and has three children living with her in a house of her own.  Maruja’s work consists in making clothes like blouses, skirts, pants, underwear, shirts and others for women, men and children.  She makes the clothes her customers request with utmost patience once they’ve selected the specific style from magazines or catalogs.  She also often makes items she’s designed herself that she then puts up for sale in a small space inside her home.  She’s been in this occupation for more than 9 years and has always worked alone; she states that she’s never had a customer complaint.

On this occasion she will ask for 600 soles and she’s grateful for the opportunity being offered to make her work plans reality.  She states that she feels comfortable working with the members of her communal bank because of the responsibility each one of them demonstrates.

She will use the amount requested to buy certain amounts of fabric and thread she needs to make some articles of clothing she’ll put up for sale.

loans.use: to buy fabric and thread.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive con su familia ella se dedica a la venta de ropa blusas, camisas, faldas, etc. tienen su negocio en el lugar de su residencia tiene mucha clientela pues la buscan porque lo que vende es de buena calidad y a buen precio, la clienta solicita un crédito para poder comprar mas mercadería por mayor y poder seguir con su negocio ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y asi podrá ayudar en su casa con los gastos sin limitación alguna
texts.en: This client lives with her family and works selling clothes like blouses, shirts, skirts, etc.  Her business is located at her place of residence and she has many customers because they seek her out because what she sells is good quality at a good price.  She’s asking for a loan to be able to buy more merchandise at wholesale to continue in business since this is her only source of work and she’ll thus be able to help with household expenses with no limitations whatsoever.

loans.use: to buy more clothes at wholesale.

loans.name: Jose Elias

texts.es: Don José de 51 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años siembra los principales granos básicos como lo son el maíz y el frijol, también se dedica se dedica a la venta de ganado, comercializa sus productos con agencias de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar algunos gastos de su hogar vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus 4 hijos, don José está solicitando un crédito para la compra de insumos como: fertilizantes, abonos, semillas, herbicidas y las herramientas necesarias para seguir cultivando y asi poder obtener mejores ganancias para darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
José, 51, has worked in agriculture for several years growing the main basic grains like corn and beans.  He also works selling cattle.   He sells his products to agencies that buy and sell basic grains that are near his place of residence.  With profits obtained he’s able to cover some of his household expenses.  He lives in a house of his own with his wife and four children.

José is asking for a loan to buy supplies like fertilizer, manure, seeds and herbicide and the necessary tools to continue planting in order to earn higher profits and give his family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella tienen un negocio ubicado en el mercado que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia donde se dedica a  la venta y elaboración de recuerdos para fiestas rosas, bodas, bautizo, cumpleaños, etc. desde hace varios años tiene mucha clientela pues sus productos los vende a buen precio, la clienta solicita un crédito para poder comprar materiales como: listones, pegamento, telas, adornos, etc. para seguir con su trabajo y poder tener una mejor estabilidad económica con su esposo.
texts.en: This borrower lives in her own house with her husband. She has a business located in the market that is near her place of residence. There she has been making and selling favors for parties, weddings, baptisms, birthdays, etc., for a number of years. She has many customers, since she sells her products at a good price. She is applying for a loan to be able to buy materials such as ribbons, glue, fabrics, decorations, etc., to continue with her work and be able to have better economic stability with her husband.

loans.use: to buy ribbons, glue, fabric, decorations, etc.

loans.name: Leidy

texts.es: Leidy, de 26 años, es una mujer amable y muy trabajadora,está casada y tiene 3 hijos, actualmente vive en la casa de su madre. El trabajo de Leidy consiste principalmente en la elaboración de carbón. En compañía de su madre alquila un espacio de terreno en una lejana zona de la ciudad cuyas áreas han sido cedidas para cumplir esta función y desde ahí trabaja diariamente. Construye hornos artesanales en donde coloca la madera por largas semanas a la temperatura adecuada hasta que se conviertan en carbón. Cumple esta labor hace 1 año y la inicia desde muy temprano para evitar que el transcurrir de la mañana la sofoque intensamente. Obtiene residuos maderables en los principales aserraderos aledaños a su punto de trabajo.Lo que le gusta de su labor es que puede trabajar sin ninguna presión y generar sus propios ingresos económicos, le agrada sentir que tiene mucho más que dar laboralmente. Afortunadamente le va muy bien porque obtiene siempre una buena producción de carbón y buenos ingresos de estos.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 600, está agradecida y contenta al saber que sigue contando con el apoyo financiero que necesita para avanzar con su negocio.Con el monto solicitado comprará madera y costales para vender el carbón obtenido de su última producción.
texts.en:
Leidy, 26 years old, is a kind and hardworking woman. She is married and has three children. Currently, Leidy lives with her mother and makes a living producing charcoal. She and her mother rent a small plot of land on the outskirts of the city that has been assigned to make charcoal. Leidy works there every day making artisan ovens in which they use wood to produce coal by inserting wood in the oven for many weeks at high temperatures until it turns into charcoal. 

Leidy has been working in this way for a year. She starts working very early in the morning in order to avoid combining her working conditions with the suffocating effect of the day's heat. Leidy gets wood waste from a sawmill near where she works. What she enjoys most about her job is being able to work unpressured and generating her own source of income. She really feels that her work contributes to society. Fortunately, things are going well for Leidy because she produces good charcoal and generates good earnings. 

Leidy is very grateful and happy to know that she still has the financial support she needs to advance with her business. She is requesting 600 Peruvian soles to buy wood and sacks for her most recently produced charcoal in order to sell it.

loans.use: to buy wood and sacks for charcoal.

loans.name: Rafael Antonio

texts.es: Don Rafael de 66 años de edad se dedica al cultivo de maíz y maicillo también a la venta de ganado desde hace varios años, vende sus cosechas con los comercios de compra-venta de granos básicos que están cerca de su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logra solventar los gastos de su hogar vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus 5 hijos, don Rafael solicita un crédito para poder comprar abonos, fertilizantes, semillas, herbicidas y poder mejorar su terreno que es el que muestra en la fotografía para poder seguir cultivando y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en:
Rafael, 66, works growing corn and sorghum and also sells cattle; he’s been doing this for several years.  He sells his crops to firms that buy and sell basic grains that are near his place of residence and with profits earned from his sales is able to cover his household expenses.  He lives in his own house with his wife and five children.

Rafael requests a loan to be able to buy manure, fertilizer, seeds and herbicide and to be able to improve the soil that appears in the photo to continue farming and giving his family better economic stability.

loans.use: to buy farm supplies and improve the soil.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a door for his taxi.

loans.name: Por Siempre Alegres Sr Group

texts.es:
La A.C. “POR SIEMPRE ALEGRES SR” iniciará el sexto ciclo en Pro Mujer, como parte del Centro Focal de Panamericana, está compuesta por ocho  integrantes y está dirigida por una mesa directiva donde la señora Rosa es la Tesorera. Los negocios que las integrantes de la asociación comunal llevan adelante son variados entre ellos existen: venta de comida, tejido de mantas, tejido de polainas, accesorios de autos, venta de busos de lana, venta de cocinas, venta de hierbas medicinales.

El crédito que sacaran beneficiara a pequeñas microempresarias donde la señora Rosa es integrante, ella indica que hace tres años que integra Pro Mujer, ingresando por la invitación de una amiga que es socia de la institución. En la actualidad ella tiene un negocio de venta de autopartes; da a conocer que este negocio lo emprendió con un pequeño capital que formó durante quince años, luego con el apoyo de sus tíos emprendió este nuevo negocio.
 
El crédito que ahora sacará es para el aumento de capital (compra autopartes) que adquirirá de las ferias, por mayor, y posteriormente lo comercializará en su espacio de venta. Esta forma de trabajo le permite generar recursos para mantener en lo posible a su hogar pues ella es casada y tiene cuatro hijos.  

Cuando se le consulta qué le gusta de Pro Mujer, ella responde que le gusta el área de salud.
texts.en:
The “Por Siempre Alegres SR” (Always Cheerful SR) communal bank will start its 6th cycle in Pro Mujer as part of the Panamericana Focal Center.  It has 8 members led by a governing board whose treasurer is Rosa.  The members of the communal bank carry out a variety of activities among which are food sales, blanket weaving, legging knitting, car accessories, wool sweatshirt sales, stove sales and sale of medicinal herbs.

The loan they are taking out will benefit small microbusiness women like Rosa.  She indicates that she’s been part of Pro Mujer for three years having joined thanks to an invitation from a girlfriend who is a member of the institution.  She currently has a business selling auto parts.  She lets it be known that she started the business with a little capital over fifteen years and then with support from her uncles she started this new business.

The loan she’ll take out now is to increase capital.  She will buy auto parts at wholesale in street markets and then resell them in her sales space.  This way of working makes it possible for her to generate resources to support her home the best way possible; she’s married and has four children.  When asked what she likes about Pro Mujer, she answers that she likes the health area.

loans.use: to buy auto parts.

loans.name: Holman Ovidio

texts.es: Holman es un microempresario exitoso hombre, acompañado, tiene dos hijos de edad, desde hace 17 años tiene una pulpería en su domicilio, su esposa y el atienden el negocio, es nuevo de ser cliente en la institución  tiene 6 meses, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de ropa como pantalón de varon, pantalón de dama, camisetas varón, faldas de dama, ropa interior de dama, bóxer de varon, camisas hollisters etc.
texts.en: Holman’s a successful micro businessman.  He has a spouse and two children.  He’s had a grocery store at home for 17 years that he and his wife tend to.  He’s only been a client of the institution for six months.  He will use the loan to buy clothes like men’s trousers, women’s trousers, men’s t-shirts, women’s skirts, women’s underwear, men’s boxers, Hollister shirts, etc.

loans.use: to buy clothes.

loans.name: Romeo De Jesus

texts.es: Romero vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos el se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años vende sus productos en los mercados que están cerca de  su lugar de residencia con las ganancias que obtiene de sus ventas logar solventar algunos gastos de su hogar, romeo esta solicitando un crédito para comprar arena, cemento, ladrillos, etc. para mandar a repellar la pared principal de su vivienda y hacer un cuarto para trasladar el comedor,  y que puedan sus hijos vivir mas cómodos en su vivienda ya que con lo que gana no le alcanza para poder realizarlo.
texts.en: Romeo lives in his own house with his two children. He has been working in agriculture for a number of years. He sells his products in the markets that are near his place of residence. With the earnings that he obtains from his sales, he manages to pay some household expenses. Romeo is applying for a loan to buy sand, cement, bricks, etc., to have the main wall of his home plastered and make a room so that he can relocate the dining room and his children can live more comfortably in their home, since what he earns does not reach far enough to be able to do it.

loans.use: to buy sand, cement, bricks, etc.

loans.name: Mario Javier

texts.es: Don mario se dedica a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maíz y el frijol se dedica a esta actividad desde hace varios años, cuando su cosecha ya esta lista la almacena en los sacos que muestra la fotografía para luego salir a comercializarlos a las agencias que esta cerca de su lugar de residencia, con las ganancias que obtiene logra solventar los gastos que tiene en su hogar, don mario vive en casa propia con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, el esta solicitando un crédito para comprar bonos, semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc. para poder obtener mejores cosechas y darle a su familia lo que necesitan sin limitación alguna.
texts.en:
Mario works in agriculture and primarily grows corn and beans. He has worked in this activity for several years. When his crops are ready he puts them into sacks that are in the photograph. He later goes to sell his crops to stores that are near his home. With the income he earns he his able to pay for the household expenses. Mario lives in his own home with his wife and 4 children. 

He is requesting this loan to purchase manure, seeds, fertilizer, herbicides, etc. to be able to have a better yield and give his family what they need without hesitation.

loans.use: to purchase manure, seeds, fertilizer, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Holman

texts.es: Holman es microempresario emprendedor hombre de 39 años de edad, casado, con cuatro hijos todos menores, su negocio es la agricultura lo cual tiene cinco años de dedicarse a esa actividad, además tiene un empleo como supervisor en un restaurante en su localidad, el crédito lo invertirá en la compra de semillas mejorada, preparación del terreno, abono, alquiler de la tierra, pesticidas etc.
texts.en: Holman is a microbusinessman, an entrepreneurial man of 39. He is married, with four young children. His business is agriculture, and he has five years of experience working in this activity. In addition, he has a job as supervisor at a restaurant in his town. He will invest the loan in the purchase of improved seeds, preparing the land, compost, renting the land, pesticides, etc.

loans.use: to buy improved seeds, prepare the land, buy fertilizer, rent the land, buy pesticides, etc.

loans.name: Haydar

texts.en: Haydar is a married Iraqi who is 35 years old and the father of two children. He provides for his family by running a grocery store where he sells various products, including canned food, drinks, snacks and detergent. He established his business in 2009 and, thanks to his competitive prices, became well-known and developed an excellent reputation. He is requesting a loan for $2,400 to pay the annual rent for his store. His goal is to grow his business and increase his profits so that he can provide his family with higher living standards.

loans.use: to pay the annual rent for his grocery store.

loans.name: Salma

texts.en:
Salma is a 50-year-old diligent and hardworking woman living in Rawalpindi, Pakistan, along with her husband and three daughters. Her husband is a government employee, and all of her children are currently studying in schools. Her husband’s monthly income is not enough to meet the household expenses. They are living in a rented house, and she desires to have her own house as they have to pay very high house rent every month. 

Salma has been helping her husband by selling cloth for three years. She has requested a loan from Kiva’s partner, BRAC Pakistan, to buy new varieties of cloth and expand her business. With the profit amount, she wants to pay the educational expenses of her children and save some money for the future. 

Salma is very hopeful that the loan will be a productive one for them. She is very thankful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for their support.

loans.use: to purchase new, colorful cloth.

loans.name: Fallah

texts.en: Fallah is a married youth client from Iraq. He is 25 years old, the father of one child and the owner of a small shop where he sells women's clothing. This shop is his sole source of income. Fallah established his business in 2009 and has gained good experience in this field. Today, he is well-known in the area thanks to the high-quality goods he sells. He is requesting a youth loan for $3,000 to renovate his shop. His goal is to grow his business and increase his profits so that he can take better care of his family.

loans.use: to renovate his shop.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase supplies to maintain her coffee crops

loans.name: Shahida

texts.en:
Shahida is a 44-year-old hardworking woman. Her husband is a laborer by profession, and he has a very low monthly income. She has four children who are currently studying in government schools. 

Shahida has some enterprising skills, and she is running a small business in her house. She has been selling crockery and utensils for households for four years. Her business is increasing with the passage of time. 

Currently, she has requested a loan from Kiva's partner, BRAC Pakistan. She would purchase new crockery items and utensils like glasses, plates, spoons, forks, etc., so that her sales would be increased. 

With the profit amount, Shahida would pay the tuition fees for her children. She is very thankful to Kiva and is very hopeful for her children's bright future.

loans.use: to purchase crockery items.

loans.name: Aliya

texts.en: Aliya is 32 years old, hardworking and diligent. She lives in Rawalpindi, Pakistan along her husband, a daughter and a son. Her husband is a government employee but his income is insufficient to pay all of his household expenses. Both of her children are studying in government schools. Aliya is a beautician by profession and has been operating her own beauty salon since 2010. Currently her stock of supplies is very low, which is why she is requesting a loan from Kiva's partner BRAC Pakistan to buy more beauty products like facial creams, lipstick, scrubs, makeup kits, hair colors and other products. She would also like to buy new chairs for her salon. She will use the profits she earns to repay this loan and pay her children's school fees. Her dream is to live a happy, healthy and peaceful life with her family. She is very grateful to Kiva and BRAC Pakistan for their support.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: Cristina de 43 años de edad vive en casa propia con su esposo, ella se dedica a la agricultura desde hace varios años siembra maíz y maicillo con las ganancias que obtiene y con la ayuda de su esposo logran cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, doña cristina esta solicitando un credito para poder comprar abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc. para seguir con su cosecha ya que esa es su unica fuente de trabajo y asi tener una mejor calidad de vida con su esposo.
texts.en: Cristina, who is 43 years old, lives in her own house with her husband. She has worked in agriculture for a number of years. She plants corn and sorghum. With the earnings that she obtains and with the help of her husband, they manage to cover some expenses of their household. Doña Cristina is applying for a loan to be able to buy compost, seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, etc., to continue with her crops, since this is her only source of work, and thus to have a better quality of life with her husband.

loans.use: to buy compost, seeds, fertilizers, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Alivera

texts.en: Alivera is 32 years old and the mother of two children who are 8 and 11 years old. For the last eight years, she has earned a living by selling various types of food. She is requesting this loan to buy more cassava, tomatoes, and eggplant to sell to her customers. She will use the profits made possible by this loan to build a house.

loans.use: to buy more cassava, tomatoes and eggplant to sell.

loans.name: Candy

texts.es: Candy,  de 29 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, así como alegre y extrovertida, convive con Guillermo y por el momento no tiene hijos con el, vive en su casa propia en compañía de su pareja y su hermana de 16 años de edad a la que apoya incondicionalmente.La actividad que realiza Candy es la venta de ropa para damas, caballeros y niños, en diversas tallas, colores y modelos. Además se dedica a la confección de ropas dependiendo del tipo de prenda solicitado por sus clientes que en su mayoría esta conformado por sus vecinos y en menor rango por clientes eventuales. Tiene una pequeña tienda ubicada en la parte frontal de su vivienda y ahí atiende todos los días esperando la llegada de su clientela.Lleva en este negocio un promedio de 8 años, actualmente trabaja sola y ella misma se encarga de la venta de cada uno de las prendas que tiene. Complementa su trabajo con la venta de perfumes, cremas corporales y otros productos femeninos.En esta oportunidad solicitará S/. 500, está contenta de saber que tiene el apoyo financiero para continuar con sus planes.Con el monto solicitado comprará ropa como blusas y faldas para ofrecerlos a la venta en su local de atención.
texts.en:
Candy is 29-years-old, she is a hard workingwoman, diligent, happy, and extroverted. She lives with Guillermo and for the moment she does not have children with him. She lives with her partner in their own home with her sixteen-year-old sister who they support unconditionally. 

Candy sells clothing for women, men, and children in different sizes, colors, and styles. Additionally, she works to create clothing depending on the type of garment requested by her clients. She makes garments mostly for her neighbors and sometimes for future clients. She has a small store located in the front part of her home. She works there everyday hoping her clients will arrive. She has had this business for approximately 8 years. Currently she works alone and she alone is responsible for the sale of each item she has. 

She complements her work by selling perfume, body creams, and other feminine products. Through this opportunity she is requesting 500 soles. She is happy to know that she has financial support for her plans. With the amount requested she will purchase clothing such as shirts and skirts to offer in her store.

loans.use: to purchase clothing such as shirts and skirts

loans.name: Alma Del Socorro

texts.es: Alma es una microempresaria de éxito es una mujer de 59 años de edad, soltera con dos hijos adolescentes, su negocio es la venta de muebles y artesanías actividad que se dedica desde hace 30 años  en la ciudad de Masaya, ella misma atiende su negocio y el crédito lo quiere invertir en la compra de 6 juegos de sillas abuelitas, 3 pares de esquineras, 3 juegos de comedor de 6 piezas cada una, etc.
texts.en: Alma is a successful micro-entrepreneur. She is 59-years-old and is single with two adolescent children. Her business sells furniture and crafts. She has does this activity for the past 30 years in the city of Masaya. She alone attends to her business. The loan that she wants will be invested in the purchase of a set of 6 rocking chairs, 3 sets of corner cupboards, and 3 sets of kitchen tables with 6 pieces each, etc.

loans.use: to purchase of a set of 6 rocking chairs, 3 sets of corner cupboards, and 3 sets of kitchen tables with 6 pieces each, etc.

loans.name: Poetas Group

texts.es: Doña Alejandra tiene 44 años de edad, ella es casada con el señor Roberto con el cual tiene una tintorería desde hace mas de 10 años, ellos tienen tres hijos los cuales, dos estudian la primaria y una la secundaria. Dice que hace varios años la invitó una amiga a trabajar con VisiónFund para mejorar su negocio y eso ha hecho que a través de estos rentó un local cerca del centro de su población y que le va mejor que antes ya que primero la tenía en su casa y no era muy visible y con el tiempo también fue perfeccionando y comprando maquinas especiales para lavar ropa en seco y lavadoras de mejor calidad ella dice “me gusta que mis clientes queden satisfechos con el servicio que brindo y gracias a que doy excelencia en mi trabajo he tenido mas clientela”. Dice que ella empezó con este negocio porque ella trabajaba en una tintorería. Ella después se salió y puso su propio negocio y dice que lo que la gente le gusta mas es que da precios accesibles. Ella lava desde ropa normal, hasta chamarras de piel, tenis, edredones, ropa de la iglesia, trajes y muchas cosas mas, platica que con el tiempo si ha tenido percances con la ropa pero a través de eso a agarrado mas experiencia y ahora toda la ropa que le llevan la lava con mucho cuidado. Ahorita ella esta pidiendo el crédito porque comprara, cloro, jabón, gas, diferentes líquidos que  ocupa para eliminar manchas, suavizante de telas etc, para dar un servicio de mejor calidad. Los demás integrantes del grupo se llaman Guadalupe, Rodrigo, Irma, Ricarda, Teresa, Eduardo, Beatriz, Elizabeth, Pablo y Roberto ellos invertirán en sus negocios como  diferentes productos que se ocupan en estética unisex, en la compra de refacciones para vehículo que venden en refaccionarias, en la compra de frituras, dulces, refrescos para su venta, para la compra de frutas y legumbres de temporada, para la compra de zapatos, ropa por catalogo y en la compra de paletas de hielo para su venta.
texts.en:
Alejandra, 44, is married to Roberto.  They have had a laundromat for more than 10 years.  They have three children, two in elementary school and one in secondary school.

She says that several years ago a friend invited her to work with VisiónFund to improve her business, which she has done.  She rented a place near downtown.  It's going better for her than before because the first one was in her house and not very visible.  Also, over time she improved and bought special machines for dry cleaning and higher-quality machines.  She says, "I like for my customers to be satisfied with my service.  Thanks to my excellent work I have attracted more customers."

She says she started this business because she was working in a laundry.  Then she left and set up her own business.  She says what people like most is her affordable prices.

She cleans everything from normal clothing to leather jackets, tennis shoes, quilts, dress clothing, suits, and many other things.  She says that over time she has had mishaps with the clothing but that this has given her more experience and now she very carefully washes all the clothing that it brought to her.

Right now she's requesting the loan to buy bleach, soap, gas, a variety of stain-removal products, fabric softener, etc., to give better service.

The other members of the group are Guadalupe, Rodrigo, Irma, Ricarda, Teresa, Eduardo, Beatriz, Elizabeth, Pablo, and Roberto.  They will invest in businesses such as a unisex beauty salon, buying spare auto parts to sell in repair shops, seasonal fruits and vegetables, buying shoes, clothing catalogues, buying ice pops to sell, and buying fried food, sweets, and refreshments to sell.

loans.use: to buy bleach, soap, gas, stain removers, fabric softener, etc.

loans.name: Manuel  De Jesus

texts.es: Don Manuel es un hombre muy amable y trabajador, vive con su esposa y sus tres hijos, El trabaja muy duro en su propia parcela donde siembra maíz y maicillo; sus productos son de muy buena calidad cuando su cosecha ya esta lista sale a comercializarla a los diferentes mercados que están cerca de su lugar de residencia. Don Manuel  solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL para contar con el dinero necesario e invertir en la compra de insumos agrícolas como controles de plaga y fertilizantes, abonos, semillas entre otras cosas que necesita para su siembra, él ansía aumentar sus ventas para poder percibir mayores ganancias y darle a su familia una mejor estabilidad economica.
texts.en:
Manuel is a kind and hardworking man. He lives with his wife and his three children. He works hard on his own land where he harvests corn and sorghum. His products are of very good quality. When his crops are ready he goes out and sells them in the different markets located near his home. 

Manuel is requesting a loan through Integral to be able to count on the money necessary to invest in the purchase of agricultural supplies such as pest control, fertilizer, manure, seeds, and other necessary items for the harvest. This way he can increase his sales and have better income and provide his family economic stability.

loans.use: to purchase pest control, fertilizer, manure, seeds, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy cement, concrete blocks, pvc tubes, wires, etc.

loans.name: Lucila

texts.es: Doña Lucila de 46 años de edad se dedica a la agricultura su principal siembra es el maiz y el maicillo comercializa sus productos en agencias de compra-venta de granos básicos con las ganancias que obtienen logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar, vive en casa propia con sus cuatro hijos, doña Lucila solicita un credito para poder comprar abonos, semillas, fertilizantes, herbicidas, etc.  para seguir con sus cosechas y poderle dar a sus hijos una mejor estabilidad económica.
texts.en: Lucila is 46 years old. She works in farming. Her main crop is corn and sorghum. She sells her products in agencies that buy and sell basic grains. With the profits she obtains, she is able to cover some household expenses. She lives in her own house with her four children. Lucila is asking for a loan to buy manure, seeds, fertilizer, herbicides, etc. to continue with her harvest and be able to give her children better financial stability.

loans.use: to buy manure, seeds, fertilizer, herbicides, etc.

loans.name: Anonymous

texts.es: La clienta vive con su familia en casa propia, ella posee una tienda donde vende artículos de primera necesidad, frijoles, leche, huevos, pan, entre otros, tiene muchos años con su negocio y eso le ha regalado experiencia en las ventas que le permite obtener las mejores ganancias, está ubicado en el lugar de su residencia, es muy reconocida por los vecinos de la zona , se ha hecho de mucha clientela, pues tiene la tienda surtida, ella quiere acrecentar el negocio y realizar una nueva inversión pero necesita de capital por eso solicita un crédito que le permita comprar lo necesario para su tienda como refrescos, gaseosas, golosinas, granos, básicos, etc.  asegura que cancelara la deuda y a la vez confía en que tendrá una mejor calidad de vida
texts.en:
The client lives with her family in their own home. She has a store where she sells items of basic need such as beans, milk, cheese, bread and other items. She has had her business for many years and this has given her the experience in sales that has allowed her to have good income. Her business is located in her residence. She is well recognized by the neighbors in her area. She has many clients because she has the store well stocked. 

She wants to grow the business and have a new investment but she needs capital. For this reason she is requesting a credit that will allow her to purchase the necessary items for her store such as refreshments, soda, candy, basic grains, etc. She assures that she will pay the debt and she is confident that she will have a better quality of life.

loans.use: to purchase refreshments, soda, candy, basic grains, etc.

loans.name: Erma

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Erma works hard to support her family. She has a printing business in the Philippines and earns additional income through buying and selling frozen foods. 

Erma is borrowing 20,000 Philippine pesos through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation (NWTF) to purchase fabric, thread and other materials for her printing business. She has sustained her business activities through 15 loans from NWTF. She has successfully paid back previous loans and is requesting this new one to further build her printing business.

She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream of saving enough money to expand her business.

loans.use: To purchase additional fabric, thread, etc., for her business

loans.name: Jean Pierre

texts.en:
Jean Pierre is 27 years old. He sells shoes and has been in the business for ten years. 

With the loan, he wants to buy more used shoes for sale. The profits from the business will be used to build his farm.

loans.use: to buy more used shoes for sale.

loans.name: Ma. Filpa

texts.en:
Ma.Filpa is a 30-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has five children. The oldest is 10, while the youngest is 1 year old. 

She is engaged in seaweed farming. She has been into seaweed farming for almost ten years now. This is the family's source of income. She requested a loan of 5,000 PHP to buy straw and tissue and to pay the laborer. 

In the future, Ma.Filpa would like to invest in another business, if possible, for additional income to meet the family's daily needs and to finance her children's education.

loans.use: to buy straw and tissue and to pay the laborer.

loans.name: Aida Yolanda

texts.es: Aida Yolanda vive en el municipio del Oro es una comunidad muy bonita se caracteriza por tener personas artesanas, por sus lugares tan picarescos por sus colores llamativos. A doña Yolanda no le gusta que por ningún motivo le dijan Yolanda de cariño es conocida como Yola ella tiene 50 años de edad está casada desde hace 32 años con el señor Alejandro juntos formaron una familia con dos hijos, de los cuales ya ninguno depende de ellos. Doña Yola tiene estética desde hace 18 años, platica que inicio su estética porque desde muy pequeña le gustaba cortar el cabello, Doña Yola comentó “Me case muy joven pero desde que me case estudie para mejorar mi calidad de trabajo para esto no tenia el local para la estética sin embargo mientras yo estudiaba mi esposo y yo con mucho esfuerzo construimos la estica juntando botellas en las calles las vendíamos y con las ganancias comprábamos material para la realización de la estética poco a poco la terminamos, los tintes, peines, cepillos, tratamientos entre otras cosas las compramos gracias a los créditos que VisionFund y KIVA han otorgado el cual estoy muy agradecida” Doña Yola esta solicitando el crédito para comprar tintes, tratamientos, peróxidos, shampoo, cepillos, etc. le gusta mucho atender su estética tiene mucha tiene clientela anteriormente atendía al publico pero ahora ya no solo atiende por citas, Doña Yola es muy alegre siempre anda de muy buen humor sus clientas la quieren mucho pero sobretodo muy trabajadora y responsable con su trabajo, En el negocio de Doña Yola no tiene ninguna dificultad siempre ha tratado de sacar adelante su trabajo con mucha calidad para que sus clientas regresen las metas de Yola ya están cumplidos siempre deseo tener una estética reconocida y llegar a tener sus departamentos lo cual ha conseguido con gran esfuerzo.
texts.en:
Aida Yolanda lives in the municipality of Oro, a very beautiful community known for its artisans, its picturesque scenery, and its striking colours. 
Doña Yolanda does not like to be called Yolanda at any time; she is lovingly known as Yola. She is 50 years old and has been married for 32 years to Señor Alejandro. Together, they have built a family; they have two children, neither of whom are dependent on them anymore. Yola has had a beauty parlour for 18 years. She says that she started her beauty parlour because she loved cutting hair even when she was very young. 
Yola told us "I got married very young, but after that I studied in order to improve the quality of my work. I didn't have a place for my salon, but while I studied my husband and I worked very hard to build the shop, gathering bottles in the streets and selling them. With the income from that we bought material for building the shop. Bit by bit we finished it. The dyes, the combs, the brushes, the treatments, and other things, we bought thanks to loans from Vision Fund and Kiva; I am very grateful for this".
Yola is requesting this loan for the purchase of dyes, treatments, peroxides, shampoo, brushes, etc. She loves working at her beauty parlour. She has a lot of clientele. She used to serve anyone, but now only works by appointment. Yola is very happy and is always in a very good mood. Her customers love her. Above all, she is very hard-working and responsible with her work. 
Yola does not have any problems with her business. She has always tried to succeed in her work by providing good quality service so that her clients come back. Her goals are all met, though she always wants to maintain a recognized salon and to have her space, which she has achieved through great hard work.

loans.use: to buy shampoo, dyes, etc.

loans.name: Sorpresa Group

texts.es: El grupo sorpresa está conformado por ocho personas siete mujeres y un hombre todas son personas muy trabajadoras, Doña Hilaria forma parte del grupo Sorpresa tiene 44 años de edad está casada desde hace 26 años con el señor Juan juntos formaron una familia con seis hijos de los cuales dos de ellos aun dependen de dicha pareja. Doña Hilaria es una persona muy trabajadora comenta que desde hace 27 años se dedica a la crianza, engorda y venta de borregos. Inicio su actividad porque desde pequeña sus padres le enseñaron a cuidar estos animalitos pero cuando se caso con el señor Juan tuvo que emprender su propio negocio para poder ayudar con los gastos del hogar y la educación de sus hijos ya que muchas veces el trabajo del señor Juan no alcanzaba para solventar los gastos del hogar; de alguna manera Doña Hilaria tenía que apoyarlo, ella comenta “La verdad me gusta mucho ayudar a mi esposo porque con esta actividad puedo estar con mis hijos y no descuidarlos". Esta vez está solicitando el crédito para comprar mas borregos y pastura que servirá como alimento  para sus animalitos, durante años le fue muy bien, sus ganancias eran muy buenas, pero ahora se está enfrentando en la competencia que tiene en su propia comunidad, ya que la mayoría de sus vecinos se dedica a la cría de borregos, por eso a la hora de vender resulta mas complicado porque ya no quieren pagar el precio justo del borrego, sin embargo, esto no la detiene para poder lograr sus sueños, la única meta de Doña Hilaria es ver realizados profesionalmente a sus hijos, que puedan terminar una carrera profesional; aunque sus otros hijos no pudieron terminar una carrera. Doña Hilaria esta muy contenta y agradecida con KIVA y VisionFund por el crédito otorgado. Los otros integrantes del grupo son Doña Leticia quien invertirá en sus bordados, Adelina, Juana, Noe, Juliana, Benita, Graciela, invertirán en borregos.
texts.en:
The Sorpresa group is made up of eight people, seven women and one man.  All of them are very hard-working people.  Hilaria is part of the Sorpresa group.  She is 44 years old, and she has been married to Juan for 26 years.  Together they make up a family with six children, two of whom are still dependent upon them.

Hilaria is a very hard-working person.  She says that she has been raising, fattening, and selling sheep for 27 years.  She says that she started this business activity because when she was little her parents taught her how to care for these little animals.  When she got married to Juan she had to start her own business in order to be able to help with the household expenses and her children’s education because often Juan’s work did not cover the household expenses.  Somehow, Hilaria had to help him.  She says, “The truth is that I really liked helping my husband in this way because it allowed me to be with my children and not neglect them”.  

This time she is requesting the loan to buy more lambs and fodder, which will serve to feed her animals.  For years her profits were very good, but she is now facing competition that she has in her own community.  Most of her neighbors raise lambs.  Therefore, it is more complicated when it is time to sell.  People don’t want to pay the price they have normally been paying for lambs.  Nevertheless, this does not stop her from achieving her dreams.  Hilaria's only goal is to see her children professionally fulfilled.  She wants them to be able to finish studying a professional career even though her other children were not able to complete a career.

Hilaria is very happy and grateful to Kiva and Vision Fund for the loan that was granted.  The other group members are Leticia, who will invest in her embroidery, Adelina, Juana, Noe, Juliana, Benita, and Graciela will invest in sheep. because they will be able to invest like Leticia will invest in her embroideries and Adelina, Juana, Noe, Juliana, Benita, and Graciela will invest in lambs.

loans.use: to buy three lambs and fodder for her flock.

loans.name: Ariunjargal

texts.en:
Ariunjargal, 22, lives with her husband and daughter Nasandelger in Ger in the Bayanhongor province of Mongolia. Her husband Erhembayar runs a transportation service with his old Russian van. 

Ariunjargal worked as a saleswoman for years. She then gave birth to her daughter and is now sending her daughter to kindergarten and starting her own retail business selling clothes at a counter at a local market. 

She has experience selling clothes at a retail store. She is now requesting a loan of 3,000,000 Mongolia tughrik to import clothes from Erlian, China to sell to local customers. 

Ariunjargal is tasteful, energetic and a hardworking young woman.

loans.use: to import clothes from Erlian, China to sell to local customers

loans.name: Grace

texts.en: Grace is 28 years old. She is a mother of one child, age two. Grace has sold shirts and skirts for the past five years. With the loan she would like to buy more shirts and skirts to sell. The profits from the business will be used to make more savings.

loans.use: to buy more shirts and skirts to sell.

loans.name: Thorn

texts.en:
Age 54 and a villager from Sampov Meas district of Pursat Province, Thorn is married and blessed with six children. To struggle for a living she grows rice on half a hectare of farmland and produces brown sugar made from sugar palm juice as the main source of income. This is the business that she has had since she was 24 years old. 

With this new loan, she is in third loan cycle with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner). The past loans, which she has fully repaid back, have supported her business promptly. Now, she is seeking for 2,500,000 KHR in order to buy pigs for raising for extra income, and pig feed plus buffalo. She hopes to increase her income and expand her animal husbandry on a larger scale.

loans.use: to buy pig, pig feed, and buffalo.

loans.name: Pelagie

texts.en: Pelagie is the mother of one child age four years old. She has shifted from selling airtime voucher cards to clothes. She has requested this loan to buy more clothes for sale. The profits from the business will be used to pay school fees for her child.

loans.use: to buy more clothes for sale.

loans.name: Hussain

texts.en:
Hussain is a 29-year-old youth client from from Iraq. He lives with his family of 5 members, of whom 3 provide the income of the family together.

Hussain owns a shop where he launders clothes and irons them. He established his business in 2010 and gained his experience through working at a similar shop for several years as an employee. Now Hussain has his own employee hired and has gained an excellent reputation thanks to his fast work and on-time delivery.

Hussain is requesting a youth loan of 2,400 USD, which he will use to buy a motor generator and a washing machine. Hussain is aiming to grow and expand his business so that he may provide himself and his family better life conditions.

loans.use: to buy a motor generator and a washing machine.

loans.name: Sokha

texts.en:
Sokha, 57, is a farmer from Pursat Province’s Sampov Meas district, Cambodia. To deal with the daily cost of living she plants orange and custard apple as the main source of income. The 10 years involvement in the current business has returned her about 21,900 KHR per day. 

Sokha has been with VisionFund (Kiva’s partner) for past two cycles and has repaid back her past loan already. The past loan enabled her to sustain her business on time. 

Now she is seeking for 1,200,000 KHR in order to smooth her plantation. She hopes to multiply her income so she can expand her farmland, especially in growing a new kind of fruit, cashew nut, for extra income.

loans.use: to smooth her farmland on her plantation.

loans.name: Emilia Rubidia

texts.es: Doña Emilia de 57 años de edad es una mujer muy responsable, trabajadora y honrada, trabaja en su propia panadería en la que elabora pan dulce y pan francés, y sale a venderlo por las diferentes colonias donde ella reside con las ganancias que obtienen logra cubrir algunos gastos de su hogar vive en casa propia con su esposo, su hija y sus tres nietos, doña Emilia  solicita un préstamo para invertir en la compra de harina, manteca, latas y todo lo necesario para poder producir más pan. Este proyecto de mejoramiento para su panadería es muy importante para ella puesto que así mejorará su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Emilia is 57 and a very responsible, hard-working and honest woman. She works in her own bakery where she makes sweet bread and french bread, and goes out to sell it around different neighborhoods where she lives. 

With the earnings she gets, she manages to cover some of her household expenses. She lives in her own home with her husband, her daughter, and her three grandchildren. 

Emilia is requesting a loan so that she can invest in the purchase of flour, lard, baking tins, and everything she needs to be able to produce more bread. This project for improving the bakery is very important to her, as this way she will improve quality of life for her and her family.

loans.use: To buy flour, lard, baking tins, etc.

loans.name: Mariam

texts.fr: Madame Mariam est une femme mariée qui  vit au Sénégal. Elle s’active dans le secteur de l’élevage et pratique l’aviculture depuis 5 ans. Elle est membre à l’un des guichets de l’U-IMCEC et elle sollicite un crédit de 300.000 francs CFA pour commander des poussins et acheter  des aliments pour leur nourriture. Son intention est d’augmenter sa production pour satisfaire la demande croissante de sa clientèle. Par  conséquent elle pourra accroitre ses bénéfices et contribuer a l’amélioration des conditions alimentaires de sa famille et renforcer davantage son fond de roulement. Il souhaite disposer d’un locale beaucoup plus grand  pour augmenter sa productivité en poulets.
texts.en:
Mariam is a married woman who lives in Senegal.  She is actively involved in raising livestock and has been working as a poultry farmer for five years.  She is a client of one of the branches of the UIMCEC, and she is requesting a loan of 300,000 CFA francs to place an order of young chickens and buy chicken feed.

Mariam wants to increase her production in order to meet her customers' increasing demand.  As a result, this will allow her to increase her profits, improve her family's food conditions and further strengthen her working capital.

Mariam would like to have a much larger farm, so that she could increase her poultry production.

loans.use: to buy young chickens and chicken feed.

loans.name: Guadalupe Del Carmen

texts.es: Guadalupe de 33 años de edad vive en casa propia con su compañero de vida y su hija de 11 años, Ella posee una venta de ropa tiene de diferentes estilos y  para todas las personas damas, caballeros, niños y niñas, la ropa que comercia es de muy buena calidad y la vende a precios accesibles es por eso que se ha hecho de mucha clientela últimamente; Guadalupe  es muy activa siempre se encuentra trabajando,  luchando por salir adelante. Para Guadalupe el propósito y coraje que le pone a su labor tiene una dirección ver crecer el negocio para lograr un mejor futuro, es por eso que se decidió solicitarle a INTEGRAL un crédito que le permita comprar ropa en variedad como faldas, pantalones, blusas, camisetas, trajes etc. Así siempre podrá satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes. Ella  tiene la esperanza que de esta forma lograra darle a su familia seguridad económica y una vida plena.
texts.en:
Guadalupe is 33, and lives in her own house with her life partner and her 11-year-old daughter. She sells clothing in different styles and for everyone: women, men, and children. The clothing she sells is very good quality and she sells it at affordable prices. That is why she has acquired a lot of customers lately. 

Guadalupe is very busy and is always working and striving to succeed. For Guadalupe, the purpose and courage that she puts into her work has one aim: to see the business grow so that she can achieve a better future. 

That is why she decided to request a loan from Integral, which will allow her to buy a variety of clothing such as skirts, pants, blouses, T-shirts, outfits, etc. In this way she will always be able to satisfy the needs of her customers. She hopes that this way she will succeed in giving her family financial security and a full life.

loans.use: To buy a variety of clothing such as skirts, pants, blouses, T-shirts, outfits, etc.

loans.name: Kos Wende Group

texts.fr:
Mme S.MARIE  est la représentante du groupe KOS WENDE. Mme se porte bien et à accoucher son troisième enfant. Elle est mariée et mère de 03 enfants. Le plus âgé a 20ans et le moins âgé a 02ans. 02 vont à l’école. Elle a 05 personnes en charge.
Elle vend des condiments, des céréales depuis 07ans. Elle s’approvisionne au grand marché de toécin et dans les villages environnants. Ses clients sont les femmes et les hommes.
Elle veut  s’acheter  03 sacs d’haricots, 05sacs de mil et des condiments.
Mme veut réinvestir ses bénéfices dans son commerce. Elle ambitionne  étendre les limites de son activité et améliorer les conditions de vie de sa famille.
texts.en:
Mrs. S. Marie is the representative of the Kos Wende group. She is doing well and has given birth to her third child [since the time of the previous loan]. She is married and has three children. The oldest is 20 and the youngest is two. Two of her children are in school. She has five dependents.
She has been selling condiments and cereals for seven years. She stocks up at the large market in Toécé and nearby villages. Her customers are both men and women. She would like to buy three bags of beans, five bags of millet and some condiments. She would like to reinvest the revenues in her business. Her goal is to expand her business and improve her family’s life conditions.

loans.use: to buy three bags of beans, five bags of millet and some condiments.

loans.name: Grace

texts.en:
Grace lives in Kongowea, Kenya. She is married and has one child, aged 17 years. She has been operating a retail business for one year now in her area. She sells products such as sweet potatoes and soft drinks.

She knew of Milango through friends, and now she is seeking a loan of 53,250 Kenya shillings to buy retail stock for her shop. She wants to raise capital to be able to start a fast food joint in five years. Her challenge is raising capital, and that’s what she wants to overcome. 

Grace wants to raise her living standard.

loans.use: to buy retail stock for her shop.

loans.name: Florencio

texts.en:
This is Florencio. He previously accessed a PHP 15,000 loan that he used to buy more fish. His earnings were a big help for the education of his children and with their personal, household and business expenses. He would like to apply for another loan, of PHP 51,000, which he will be using to buy a variety of fish for his business. His profits from his business will definitely help him to cover their daily needs and the educational expenses of his children. He looks forward to this financial improvement with gladness and thankfulness in his heart. He hopes to put up a new business and dreams to give a good life and education to his children. He meets with his co-fellowship* members to share stories of his work every week, where he can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God he studies.

* All CCT community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, to build social capital, and to repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy a variety of fish for his business.

loans.name: Bakhtiyor

texts.ru: Бахтиёр житель города Кургантюбе. Ему 51 год. Он женат и является отцом одной дочери и одного сына. Его дети уже взрослые и самостоятельные. Жена Бахтиёра не работает, она ведет домашнее хозяйство. Сейчас Бахтиёр хочет заняться услугой такси. У него имеется сбережение, а также опыт вождения. Однако чтобы закупить автомашину и начать деятельность, ему не хватает денежной суммы. Поэтому Бахтиёр обратился за кредитом. Бахтиёр планирует предоставлять услуги такси по маршрутной линии города Кургантюбе и в день совершать пять рейсов.
texts.en:
Bakhtiyor is a resident of the city of Qurgan-Tube.  He is 51 years old, married, and the father of two adult children, a daughter and a son, who now live independently.  Bakhtiyor's wife is not employed: she takes care of the household.

Bakhtiyor wants to provide taxi services.  He has some savings and is also an experienced driver.  However, he does not have enough money to buy a car and start working, and this is why he is requesting a loan.  He is planning to provide his taxi services along one of the routes of the city of Qurgan-Tube, doing five round-trips per day.

loans.use: to purchase a car in order to provide taxi services.

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a 42-year-old married woman  from Ubay, Bohol and the mother of six children. She runs and operates a sari-sari or variety store business selling various goods and items to the people in her area. Her husband works as a fisherman. 

Elizabeth is asking for a loan to buy materials for fishing like nylon, nets, hooks and others. Through this, her husband will be able to improve his catch, thus giving them more fish to sell in the market.

loans.use: to buy materials for fishing like nylon, nets, hooks and others

loans.name: Abduqahhor

texts.ru: Абдукаххор женатый молодой человек. Ему 28 лет. Он живет с женой у родителей в городе Турсунзаде. Жена Абдукаххора домохозяйка, а его родители занимаются растениеводством. Абдукаххор имеет среднее образование. Он спокойный и трудолюбивый человек. Абдукаххор тоже занимается растениеводством. Он научился этому делу еще в детстве когда помогал родителям. Вот уже восемь лет как он занимается этим самостоятельно. Абдукаххор на небольшом участке земли построил парник, где высаживает овощи. Он запрашивает кредит для закупа минерального удобрения, чтобы обработать землю и получить хороший урожай. Абдукаххор за счет прибыли планирует приобрести себе машину.
texts.en:
Abduqahhor, aged 28, is a young married man who lives with his parents and his wife in the city of Tursun-zoda.  His wife is a homemaker and his parents are involved in agriculture.  Abduqahhor has a secondary education.  He is a quiet and hardworking man who is also involved in agriculture, a professional activity he learned while helping his parents when he was a child.

Abduqahhor has had his own agricultural business for eight years already.  He has built a greenhouse on a small piece of land, and he is growing vegetables.  He is requesting a loan to buy mineral fertilizers in order to treat his soil and get a good harvest.

Abduqahhor plans to use his profits to purchase a car.

loans.use: to purchase mineral fertilizers to grow vegetables.

loans.name: Amgalan

texts.en: Amgalan is 37 years old and lives with her husband and four daughters in a small house in the Bayanhoshuu area of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband Oyunbaatar works at a local state owned company. Her older two daughters go to local schools and her twin daughters aged two go to a local kindergarten. Amgalan has been working as a saleswoman since 2005. She has built a close relationship with her suppliers and customers over the years and now she is starting her own business of selling secondhand shoes retail at a rental counter of the local market. She is now requesting a loan of 1,500,000 MNT to purchase a large amount of seasonal secondhand shoes to sell to local customers. She is a hardworking, positive and responsible woman.

loans.use: to purchase a large amount of seasonal secondhand shoes to sell to local customers

loans.name: Josie

texts.en: Josie is a 41-year-old married woman from Talibon, Bohol. She has four children. The oldest child is 21 while the youngest is 7. She is engaged in seaweed farming. She grows seaweed. She has been growing seaweed for almost 10 years now. Josie requested a loan of 6,000 PHP to buy straw, additional seaweed seedlings and to pay the laborer's fee. In the future, Josie would like to expand her business to support her family and also to save for the education of her children.

loans.use: to buy straw, additional seaweed seedlings and to pay the laborer's fee

loans.name: Tufaidi Group

texts.en:
The borrower, who is in his early 30s, is single. He has been selling milk for three years now. He works from 4:00 in the morning and sells up to 10:00 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit.  

This will be his third loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loans to buy more milk and managed to sell to many customers. He also started selling sweet potatoes as bites. So when he boils milk he also fries sweet potatoes and he sells them as bites. He used the profit to take care of himself to cover household expenses.  He will use this loan to buy more milk and sweet potatoes. His dream is to one day be able to build his own house.

He will share this loan with his loan group "Tufaidi" with fourteen members, who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more milk and sweet potatoes.

loans.name: Sitora

texts.ru:
Ситора уже второй раз обращается за кредитом. Свой предыдущий заем она брала для увеличения товарооборота и на сумму кредита закупила шапки, банные халаты и домашние тапочки. За счет полученной прибыли она построила дом.
Теперь Ситора снова запрашивает кредит. Она хочет закупить ассортимент одежд на продажу и таким образом увеличить товарооборот. Ситора очень любит свой торговый бизнес, так как он помогает ей быть независимой и обеспечивать семью. В будущем Ситора планирует расширить бизнес и открыть магазин на рынке города.
texts.en:
Sitora is requesting a loan for the second time.  She had requested her previous loan to increase her commodity turnover and she used her loan amount to buy hats, bathrobes and indoor slippers.  With the profits that she made, she was able to build a house.

Sitora is now requesting a loan to buy an assortment of clothes for resale, in order to increase her sales volume.  She really likes her retail business because it allows her to be independent and to provide for her family.

In the future, she is planning to expand her business and to open a store at the city market.

loans.use: to buy an assortment of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Damas
